titles.title: A bill to permit the transmission of information assisting in the placing of bets or wages on a sporting event or contest from a State where such betting is legal to a foreign country where such betting is legal.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Technology and the Law.

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to permit the transmission of information on sports betting from a State where such betting is legal to a foreign country where such betting is legal.
